subHeadline: Guests: Tom Fitton, Victor Davis Hanson

utterances.speaker: SEAN HANNITY, HOST
utterances.sentences: All right. Welcome to “Hannity.” All right. Buckle up. An avalanche is coming. I have been telling you about this. It will destroy, if there's any remaining credibility of the tinfoil hat conspiracy theorists and the rage media mob in this country, along with their allies in the Democratic hate-Trump left, and those that have abused power inside and outside of government, you are about to face the justice that many of you deserve.  We have made a promise on this program that we will hold all of them accountable, which has been a central focus of this show. And tonight, we are making real, significant progress on multiple fronts.  Now, what's going to happen in the days and weeks ahead, is this is a short list of what will be made public, beyond the Mueller report. So much more that proves that the reporting and investigation that have gone on this show for over two years will all be proven to be true. All confirmed that the investigative reporting on the show with our ensemble team, that we have been accurate and correct all along. All while the media mob and the Democratic mob have lied to you repeatedly for two and a half years.  This is just a short list of what will soon be made public. For example, we'll get into this tonight, the -- at Judicial Watch, they released today, oh, it's blockbuster. Wait until you hear what we have. Criminal referrals this week by Devin Nunes. Attorney General Barr today pledging an investigation, this has been long overdue. The Horowitz report on FISA abuse, report on the issue of leaking classified information, other information. And, of course, the release of more closed-door testimony, thanks to Congressman Collins. We have more of that tonight and we will be sharing come as a matter of fact, very blockbuster there.  Also, FISA applications, Gang of Eight materials, those 302s, they are all coming out. And also, the Ukraine issue, which is surfacing, that has so much evidence that goes right to the doorstep of yes, Joe Biden. This will all come cascading down on all these bad actors and drowned all of those people that have abused their power. Let's start with Capitol Hill. Attorney General Bill Barr today testified before the House Appropriations Committee, and he was there to talk about the DOJ's budget, but the conversation soon turned to the Mueller report, and faced with the undeniable fact that Trump-Russia collusion was a giant hoax. We have the FBI nine-month investigation, the House Intel investigation, bipartisan Senate investigation, the words are clear, and the Mueller investigation, every single one of these investigations, yes, say there was no Russia collusion whatsoever. None.  And they all in the media mob got it wrong. And now, they are shifting to new conspiracy theories. We want Donald Trump's taxes. Oh, maybe the attorney general is covering up major, phantom crimes hidden deep within the special counsel's full report. The president obstructed justice, even though the attorney general and deputy attorney general said, no, it did not happen.   And, by the way, you can watch Rachel Maddow, the leader of this tinfoil hat conspiracy brigade, once again, they are hoping and hyping and lying to their viewers with a pack of twisted lies. "Washington Post," "New York Times," not much different, once again pushing articles based on hearsay from anonymous sources. The left demanding that the full report be released immediately. But the attorney general today testifying that the full report will be released within a week. No request for executive privilege by the president have been made, the only reactions were applied based on strict, legal guidelines -- you know, like not giving away sources and methods, not allowed to leak or give out grand jury information, that's against the law. Watch this.

utterances.speaker: WILLIAM BARR, ATTORNEY GENERAL
utterances.sentences: Now, in my letter of the March 29th, I identified four areas that I feel should be redacted, and I think most people would agree. The first is grand jury information, 6E material. The second is information that the I.C., intelligence community, believes would reveal intelligence sources and methods. The third are information in the report that could interfere with ongoing prosecutions. And finally, we intend to redact information that implicates the privacy or reputational interest of peripheral players where there is a decision not to charge them. From my standpoint, by -- within a week, I will be in a position to release the report to the public.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Well, we already know there was no collusion, there was no obstruction, and President Trump has nothing to hide.   The same can't be said for the high-ranking FBI and DOJ officials, just the upper echelon, responsible for the witch hunt against the Trump campaign. Remember, code name "Crossfire Hurricane", not the innocuous midterm report. Today, major news, the Attorney General Barr vowing to hold them accountable. This is key, in what "The Hill's" John Solomon is calling, quote, the single sentence Russia bombshell that Barr delivered to Congress today that very few in the media picked up of, but this is crucial. Take a look.

utterances.speaker: BARR
utterances.sentences: The Office of the Inspector General has a pending investigation of the FISA process in the Russian investigation. And I expect that that will be complete in -- probably, in May or June, I am told. More generally, I am reviewing the conduct of the investigation and trying to get my arms around all of the aspects of the counterintelligence investigation that was conducted during the summer of 2016.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: And now, reports tonight, Barr will form a team to review the FBI's actions during the so-called phony collusion probe. The pendulum is swinging, the boomerang is now headed right back to the top, deep state actors, they will all be held accountable appeared -- mark my words -- criminal indictments are coming. And as we have reported, Congressman Devin Nunes is preparing criminal referrals as we speak for this very week. Freedom Caucus Chairman Mark Meadows saying that even more criminal referrals are on the way because of, quote, overwhelming evidence of abuse of power at the highest level of the DOJ and the FBI. And we will be getting the inspector general's report as the attorney general just mentioned, and the FISA applications against Carter Page and the results of the FISA investigation in the Senate.  And at some point, we'll also be getting the report into leaks by John Huber and we'll also be getting the 302s. That's the transcripts between, let's say, Bruce Ohr and Christopher Steele. We'll get those from the FBI, we'll get the Gang of Eight material. And thanks to Congressman Doug Collins, even today, we will be getting all of that closed-door testimony, those transcripts, from all of the key deep state actors.   And as I said, make no mistake, the evidence revealed will come cascading down on those guilty of corruption, bias, abuse of power, and I promise, it will drown them. Today, Collins, in fact, the congressman from Georgia, released testimony from James Baker. Remember, he was Jim Comey's number one lawyer. He was the general counsel at the FBI when Comey was the director. And his remarks on Capitol Hill that were revealed today behind closed-door testimony, it literally reveals the extreme bias and abuse of power that took place, that we have been telling you about at the highest levels of our government. Now, look at this, look at his remarks. James Baker was quite worried pro- Clinton political bias was affecting the FBI's investigation into then candidate Hillary Clinton. Thanks to John Solomon, we also know and I expect we will have confirmed tomorrow, that Baker later testified in a different closed-door hearing, Hillary Clinton's misconduct was alarming and appalling. And Baker said this, and its key: he believed that Clinton should have been indicted with crimes, the Espionage Act. All of these liberals concerned about obstruction of justice -- well, there was intent when Hillary deleted e-mails and acid washed her hard drive, we have the testimony of James Baker today, the exact date that they used Bleach Bit. But, of course, he was talked out of it by his boss, Jim Comey and a few others.  And that's not all. At this testimony released on Baker today is revealing what is rampant anti-Trumpet bias inside the highest levels of the FBI. Not rank-and-file. It's what we have been saying all along, we've been right all along, the chosen candidate, Hillary Clinton, got a free pass. We have a dual system of justice, no equal justice under the law, no equal application of our laws.  Trump, he was politically persecuted. They wanted him to lose, and they had an insurance policy when he won. When Baker testified that he was, quote, alarmed -- and listen to this -- freaked out when he saw the anti- Trump text between FBI investigator Strzok and FBI lawyer Lisa Page. Remember, Strzok was writing the exoneration with Comey in May, before they even did the investigation. And he was the one that interviewed Hillary Clinton. He also revealed, meaning James Baker, that Hillary Clinton's bought and paid for, phony, Russian dossier -- yes, it played a serious role in the FBI's investigation into Trump.   But we now know that Clinton paid for it. They knew it then, we knew it wasn't verified, it wasn't corroborated, and the author, well, you can verify he would never stand by himself, because he doesn't stand by it. In other words, there would have been no probable cause to investigate the campaign without Clinton's dirty Russian dossier. But, of course, Baker actually read the dossier. He had bits prior to the election, that came out today. He had a personal relationship with one of the attorneys from Perkins Coie, that's the law firm that the Clinton campaign funneled the money to so they could hire Fusion GPS, and op research firm, to then hire, of course, Christopher Steele, that then use phony, uncorroborated, Russian dirt to impact an election, how ironic.  And Baker admitted he was the intermediary between Perkins Coie and the FBI. Baker also, in this new information today, admitting he had contact with the reporter, left-winger, David Corn, prior to the election about the dossier. And he said Corn, a left-wing activist, was anxious to get the dossier into the hands of the FBI.  What does it all mean? That Comey's top lawyer, the number one lawyer at the FBI, the general counsel of the FBI, the general counsel of the FBI under Comey, James Baker, knew about rampant, pro-Hillary, anti-Trump bias, inside the FBI, to impact an election to favor one candidate over another. And, by the way, they did nothing to stop it, even though he believed crimes were committed. And that same attorney, James Baker, was in close contact with Clinton's bought and paid for law firm, and by the way, was being fed the dirty, totally phony, dossier from multiple sources, including a member of the media desperate to stop Trump. This is the United States of America, this is not banana republic. And there is more. Baker testifying in this new testimony, we just got today, that after Trump became president, the deputy attorney general who appointed Robert Mueller, Rod Rosenstein, well, he was seriously discussing a plot to remove the president under the 25th amendment. And in a separate incident, Baker alleging that Rod Rosenstein offered to wear a wire and spy on President Trump. Baker testifying that it was a very serious offer, and that Rosenstein wasn't joking.   It was revealed from today's release, it should shock the conscience of every American to their core -- let me put it this way: they tried to influence an election. And then when it didn't work, they tried to remove a duly-elected president.  Now, this damning evidence showing rampant abuse of power and corruption, it should be on the front pitch of every newspaper in this country. It is not because the rage-Trump media mob is complicit and what is a major cover-up of a deep state coup that threatened the very fabric of this great republic. And now tonight, because of judicial watch, Tom Fitton will join us later, we are finding out even more devastating information about how the deep state protected Hillary Clinton before turning their forces against Donald Trump. This is also a huge development, just out today, and we are going to break it down for you. The freedom of information act request by Judicial Watch from 2016, well, today bore fruit. It forced to the release of 422 pages of FBI documents surrounding Platte River Network. Remember Platte River Networks? That is where Hillary, the mom-and-pop shop, that had her server in a back room closet, remember that?  One government official was reviewing a batch of e-mails on the server wrote, quote: I can say now without reservation that there are literally hundreds of classified e-mails in this collection, 18 USC 793. Violation clear of the Espionage Act.  She continues: I'm very concerned about the release about the inadvertent release of the State Department's equities. When this collection is released in its entirety, the potential damage to the foreign relations of the United States could be significant, pretty much admitting that foreign actors got a hold of Hillary Clinton's e-mails. This is all coming out today. Now, get this -- FBI notes of an interview with an unidentified Platte Rivers Network official. This took place in February of ‘16. It shows an e-mail from December 11th, 2014. Hillary is wanting to run now for president, reading, quote: Hillary cover-up operation, work ticket, archive, clean up. Cover-up operation?  Then they go further, they actually give the exact date that they used the Bleach Bit to wipe the server clean, and the official being interviewed stated that the cover-up operation, e-mail, quote, probably related to a change to 60-day e-mail retention policy back up. Well, we know now that just a few months later, Platte River Networks downloaded the Bleach Bit from a vendor source called Source Forge at 11:42 a.m., hang on, March 31st, 2015. What was happening then? Oh, the Democratic candidates were debating, trying to get the nomination. Wow. Perfect time to get rid of all of this.   We know the exact second she obstructed justice in this case. That was after the deletions, prior to the beating up of the devices with hammers. Bleach Bit used on her server.  Let's sum this up. So, the FBI has proof Hillary Clinton mishandled hundreds if not thousands of top secret, classified e-mails. A clear violation of the espionage took place, and then bend over backwards, they didn't charge her, even Page and Strzok admitted that, oh, the attorney general and the DOJ were protecting her because they are all Democrats. The FBI also had proof that Clinton decided to erase 33,000 subpoenaed e- mails, acid washed the hard drives with Bleach Bit, beat up the device and with hammers, removed SIM cards, and yet they didn't even consider charging her with obstruction. It was a rigged investigation, and yet we spent the last two years on a witch hunt against Donald Trump based on phony campaign op research, Clinton putting together a phony Russian dossier. And as I said at the top of the monologue, the avalanche is coming. Equal justice is about to be served -- Comey, Clinton, Strzok, Page, McCabe, tick tock.   Joining us now, author of -- wow, what a book this was from the very beginning. It is "The Russia Hoax: The Illicit Scheme to Clear Hillary Clinton and Frame Donald Trump", Gregg Jarrett. And investigative reporter, Fox News contributor, Sara Carter. Let's start with you. The legal aspects of this, this is clear what has happened. It's really a small group of people.

utterances.speaker: GREGG JARRETT, LEGAL ANALYST
utterances.sentences: It is.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: But what they did is a spectacular betrayal of the trust, the power, the tools of intelligence we gave them.

utterances.speaker: JARRETT
utterances.sentences: And the headline today is that William Barr is personally reviewing the conduct of the FBI in launching the Trump-Russia collusion hoax. You know, he knows, and there always a plethora of evidence, that the process by the FBI was corrupted by political bias and personal animus. Just take a look at the text messages from Peter Strzok. They are virulently anti-Trump. They are profane. And he is leading the investigation of Trump. There was never any credible evidence to launch the investigation, and Lisa Page verified that in her own testimony.  Comey grudgingly admitted it. And then they made matters worse. They lied to FISA judges to obtain a wiretap warrant, so all of this, I think, William Barr is going to investigate. And when he receives them, sometimes this week from members of Congress, a criminal referral, he will read what they are laying out. The facts, the evidence, and the law, which will initiate, I believe, a criminal investigation by Barr.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: All that James Baker revealed here that Hillary's behavior was alarming, it was appalling, and worse. And he was arguing to indict her. The top lawyer of the FBI, and he didn't have the power or authority to overturn Comey and this band of Clinton supporters here.  Go ahead.

utterances.speaker: SARA CARTER, CONTRIBUTOR
utterances.sentences: This is what is so interesting, Sean, because the most important point here is that Comey went out before the public and said no reasonable prosecutor would bring charges against Hillary Clinton. Yet, his general counsel had been fighting with them for I don't even know how long, in fact, throughout the whole investigation, basically arguing that this was gross negligence, up until the very last day. And that's in Baker's testimony, when he finally changed his mind.  And he didn't answer as to why. It was as if he said he was talked into it. At the very last minute, he decided to change his mind. But you could see that he was appalled by it. He was disgusted by it. And then the fact that Comey came out and made that statement just shows that Comey was being dishonest from the very beginning.  Attorney General William Barr has a lot on his hands, because he doesn't just have to look at the Crossfire Hurricane investigation, when it started at the end of July, but he is really going to be looking at what happened before that, with Stefan Halper, the mole that was working for the FBI who was in London, and his contact with George Papadopoulos, and how that all unfolded. And also, all the information that leaked out on General Flynn. This is vitally important to understanding what was going on there. And I'm telling you, Lieutenant General Flynn is a big mystery here. The answers are going to come forward.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: What we know McCabe and Comey did, bragging about setting him up and knowing the FBI didn't think he lied, and that's when he got charged, because they were threatening his kids with potential investigation and jail. All right. So the rest of the meeting tonight, they're focused on, OK, the Mueller report. While, may become he did obstruct justice, but let's go over what is coming. We have Tom Fitton in the next.  All of the FOIA requests are coming out, Sara. Criminal referrals this week by Nunes, Barr pledging an investigation, the I.G. report on FISA abuse, leaking report by Huber, release of more closed-door testimony thanks to Doug Collins of Georgia -- the FISA applications, Gang of Eight materials, 302s, and now, of course, the Ukraine incident. OK, that's all coming.  There is no way this house of cards can stand at this point, from my perspective.

utterances.speaker: CARTER
utterances.sentences: It has no foundation, Sean. It's collapsing around everyone. And I'm going to tell you, one of the big things we can't forget here is how the senior officials within the Obama administration played into this. Let's not forget about John Brennan. Let's not forget about James Clapper, and certainly not James Comey. We need too look into all of this, and we need to find out what really happened, because what happened here was senior officials were trying to coup a sitting president.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Let's go --

utterances.speaker: JARRETT
utterances.sentences: The Department of Justice was giving the marching orders to the FBI to clear Hillary Clinton. They created a legal standard that doesn't exist in the statute. And that was the excuse to clear her, and on the very same day that Comey cleared her, that's when the Trump-Russia collusion hoax began.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: I've got to applaud both of you, you were a big part of all of this. And this ensemble team that did the work that nobody else in the media would do. Thank you.

utterances.speaker: JARRETT
utterances.sentences: Thank you.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: We are getting there. We're very close. All right, more breaking news. The stunning documents just released today, the Hillary Clinton e-mail probe directly discussing a cover up. Tom Fitton, Jason Chaffetz, they will be here. Later, Geraldo, Dan Bongino, the on the radical Democrats running for president. It's even worse than it was yesterday, if that's even possible -- straight ahead.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: All right. We continue with the big developments tonight surrounding the Clinton e-mail case. According to a review by Judicial Watch of newly released documents, just today, stemming from a 2016 Freedom of Information Act request, we now have evidence of, quote, their words, cover-up, by those within the Platte River Networks, one of the companies who managed Clinton's server. Here to explain more, Judicial Watch president Tom Fitton, Fox News contributor Jason Chaffetz. They use the word, Tom, "cover-up." That's their word, talking about Clinton, they give us the date that Bleach Bit was used. And obviously, we now know from what you released today when they tested -- they only sampled 40 e-mails and they found four that were classified and top-secret.  To me, this is damning evidence that she should have, from the get-go, been charged with violation of the Espionage Act, and I don't know. You know, she deletes subpoenaed e-mails and you Bleach Bit your hard drive, and bust up your devices, we know the intent is pretty clear. You want to eliminate the evidence.

utterances.speaker: TOM FITTON, PRESIDENT, JUDICIAL WATCH
utterances.sentences: Well, you use the word evidence, and this is what these documents are, their evidence from the FBI investigation file of the Clinton e-mail matter. And this is FBI notes, noting the Clinton e-mail cover-up, the cover-up activities. These are FBI notes and documents showing that there was this mass deletion of information. And, of course, the intelligence community had a heart attack, collectively, when they saw the hundreds of classified e-mails on her system. In fact, one of the individuals said, you know, in theory, her whole flow system should be classified, everything should be classified. And yet, nothing was done. You have to compare and contrast their refusal to act on this evidence of obstruction of justice and destruction of evidence, and lies, with what they were doing at the same time, targeting President Trump. By the way, that cover-up e-mail document? That was in December of 2014, around the very same time that Hillary Clinton secretly was forced to turn over her e-mails to the State Department, and they are talking about covering them up. And then the Bleach Bit took place less than a few weeks after it was first publicly disclosed as a result of Judicial Watch FOIA investigation that these e-mails existed. It comes out in the press, and within weeks, you got this mass deletion, and the documents show Hillary Clinton's lawyers told the vendors, don't talk to the FBI, you're not supposed to talk about the deleted information and what the lawyers may have asked you to do there.

utterances.speaker: FITTON
utterances.sentences: What a sham investigation this was.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Let me bring in Jason for a second. You know, we are going to have more FOIA request that are -- and information released. We have the inspector general report, FISA abuse, you know, leaking with John Huber, and you know, FISA applications will come out, 302s, and Gang of Eight information, and more of this behind closed door testimonies all coming out. It is now an overwhelming amount of information that proves everything a few of us have been saying for a long time, Congressman.

utterances.speaker: JASON CHAFFETZ, CONTRIBUTOR
utterances.sentences: Well look, I was the Chairman of the Oversight Committee. This stuff was under subpoena. Not only is Hillary Clinton required to preserve it based on the federal Records Act, but you're supposed to provide it for Congress based on these duly issued subpoenas. And what was the Department of Justice doing, what was Comey and the DOJ doing, they were handing out immunity agreements. This guy, Bryan Pagliano, who was running the IT operation to interacting with Platte River Networks, I got to tell you, they hand him an immunity agreement, they do nothing. And by the way, when he got that immunity agreement, there was no agreement that he had to cooperate with the federal government. It was an absolute ridiculous sham and I'm so glad that Attorney General Barr is there, because under Attorney General Barr--

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Well, such a game changer now.

utterances.speaker: CHAFFETZ
utterances.sentences: --this was going nowhere fast.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: What he said today is game changing.

utterances.speaker: CHAFFETZ
utterances.sentences: Yes, oh totally.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: But where is Michael Horowitz? He's 700 people working for him. How long does it take to - we know everything, we have everything on the FISA abuse. They were warned in August that Hillary paid for it, that it's not verified, that Steele hated Trump, and it still was used as the bulk of information for the FISA applications. Congressman?

utterances.speaker: CHAFFETZ
utterances.sentences: You have the Attorney General saying it's probably in the May- June timeframe, you want him to do it right, not do it fast. It's never fast enough, but I think it will be the most explosive and the most consequential thing to come out of this.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: And that's true--

utterances.speaker: FITTON
utterances.sentences: And we're not waiting for the IG, Sean, we're doing our FOIA lawsuits and getting the information out in the meantime.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: Yes, well you know it's so funny, all the media wants is the Mueller report. There's so much more, so much deeper, and it'd be interesting to watch them live for the next two years as they have the last two and a half.  All right, thank you both. When we come back, we have disturbing new details about the crisis on our southern border. This is real, this is now overwhelming these people at the border. You won't believe by the way, what Robert Francis Beto Bozo O'Rourke is asking farmers to do. You are not going to believe it, I promise you. We have a mini monologue, Dan Bongino, Geraldo, coming up next. Later, big update in the college admissions scandal and a lot more breaking news, straight ahead.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY
utterances.sentences: All right, tonight the 2020 Democrats, they're ramping up their Far-Left radicalism and their latest candidate maybe the most extreme yet. But first, the crisis on our southern border, it's at a breaking point, this is real, this is serious. Democrats doubling down on stupid and their obstructionist open borders, eliminate ICE agenda and refusing to work for solutions to keep the country safe and secure. Top border officials, they are continuing to sound the alarm on just how real and dire this crisis is. Take a look.

utterances.speaker: RODOLFO KARISCH, RIO GRANDE VALLEY SECTOR CHIEF PATROL AGENT

In my sector alone, we have encountered people from 50 different countries, that includes Bangladesh, China, Turkey, Egypt, Romania, to name a few.

utterances.speaker: HANNITY

Our own Lawrence Jones was with Border Patrol. And when Democrats are pushing for open borders, they are fueling more, yes, insane climate change hysteria. The $94 trillion, I think it's going to be more Green New Deal. Listen to what Robert Francis Beto O'Rourke is actually telling American farmers.

utterances.sentences: Those who have helped to champion and to write The Green New Deal are absolutely right on the money. Their comparison to this country in the 1930s and the 1940s, coming out of The Great Depression, at the same time that we confronted the existential threat, at least to the Western democracies, of Nazi Germany. If we allow farmers to make a profit in what they grow, we allow them to contribute their fair share in combating climate change by growing cover crops, allowing the technologies that invest in precision tooling and farming.

utterances.sentences: If we allow them, what? Freedom, it's a new concept perhaps for Robert Francis. Now, the bad news for Beto Bozo is that the Far Left freak show is getting even more entrance like collusion truth. Their Congressman Eric Swalwell, guess what, he announced his 2020 bid. Sure, who cares about 6 million jobs, record low unemployment, African- Americans, Hispanic Americans, Asian Americans, women in the workplace, youth unemployment. Yes, let's argue against that.

utterances.sentences: The economy is not the unemployment rate. Donald trump was bold, but a lot of what he was bold about was just bullshit. And the economy is not the stock market, it's you. When you look your family in the eyes and ask, how is our future any better off than before this guy came around? I've got just under $100,000 in student loan today. Are you doing better, saving more, and dreaming bigger?  We can do all of that. Go big. Be bold. Do good.

Forget about the six million new jobs, record low unemployment, forget about energy independence, forget about the biggest tax cuts, and yet America's energy independent, forget all of that good stuff.

utterances.sentences: Oh that's true.  If it's going to end in 12 years, I'm quitting tonight. I'm out of here, what am I worried about?

utterances.speaker: HANNITY

You know, everything's going to be free, no gas or oil or combustion engine, cows, planes. I mean that's - they think this is worse than Nazi Germany. He's just made a Nazi comparison, which sounded stupid to me.

utterances.sentences: Yes, it's really an embarrassing field. I mean Eric's Swalwell was the guy who tweeted out to a guy on Twitter that we've got the nukes.
